title: Mukul Roy, former Union Railway Minister, passes away after prolonged illness
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Mukul Roy, a prominent political figure, has passed away.
*   He formerly served as the Union Railway Minister.
*   His demise followed a prolonged illness.

title: RPF constable saves passengerâ€™s life at Kacheguda railway station
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   An RPF (Railway Protection Force) constable
*   Saved the life of a passenger
*   At Kacheguda railway station

title: Bengal unemployment aid scheme | Queuing up for cash
content:
Bengal has launched an unemployment aid scheme.
*   The scheme provides direct financial assistance, disbursed as cash payments.
*   Beneficiaries are queuing up in large numbers to collect these cash benefits.

title: Warangal CP Sunpreet Singh wins bronze as Commissionerate shines at State police sports meet
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Warangal CP Sunpreet Singh secured a bronze medal.
*   His Commissionerate also achieved significant success.
*   Both accomplishments occurred at the State police sports meet.

title: BCYP chief issues ultimatum to govt. on demands related to BCs
content:
The chief of BCYP has issued a firm ultimatum to the government.
*   The ultimatum is centered around specific demands concerning BCs (likely Backward Classes/Communities).
*   This move implies a deadline or potential repercussions if the government fails to meet these demands.

title: About 8,100 acres of land belonging to 1,055 temples retrieved, says Tamil Nadu govt.
content:
The Tamil Nadu government has announced the retrieval of land.
*   Approximately 8,100 acres of land were recovered.
*   This land originally belonged to 1,055 different temples.

title: H.D. Kumaraswamy asks Chief Minister Siddaramaiah to vacate his post to show love and generosity towards Vokkaligas
content:
H.D. Kumaraswamy has urged Chief Minister Siddaramaiah to resign from his post.
*   The demand is framed as a gesture to demonstrate "love and generosity" towards the Vokkaliga community.
*   Kumaraswamy suggests that vacating the CM's position would benefit or appeal to the Vokkaligas.

title: Minister launches project to build three new bypass roads in Tiruvannamalai
content:
A Minister has launched a new infrastructure project.
*   The initiative focuses on the construction of three new bypass roads.
*   These bypass roads will be developed in Tiruvannamalai.

title: BJP, TDP stage protest against Congress for disrupting global AI Summit
content:
The BJP and TDP parties have launched a protest.
*   Their protest targets the Congress party, accusing it of disruption.
*   The disruption in question specifically refers to an alleged interference with a global AI Summit.

title: Union Minister Suresh Gopi says Vizhinjam port materialised after he raised it with PM Modi in 2014
content:
Union Minister Suresh Gopi claims credit for the materialization of the Vizhinjam port.
*   He states he raised the project's importance directly with Prime Minister Modi.
*   Gopi attributes the port's eventual realization to this conversation, which took place in 2014.
